doctor.name: Dr. Md. Tariqul Islam Khan
doctor.specialty: Physical Medicine (Pain, Arthritis, Paralysis, Stroke) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Tariqul Islam Khan is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Physical Medicine). He is a Junior Consultant, Physical Medicine at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medipath Diagnostic Complex, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Tariqul Islam Khan at Medipath Diagnostic Complex, Rajshahi is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Shuvecca View, Greater Road, Laxmipur, Kajihata, Rajshahi

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Tamjid Ali
doctor.specialty: Physical Medicine (Pain, Arthritis, Stroke, Paralysis, Sports Injury) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Tamjid Ali is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MACP (USA), MD (Physical Medicine). He is a Consultant (Physical Medicine) at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Tamjid Ali at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 3.30pm to 9.30pm (Closed: Friday).
